title: Arcade Beauty Acquires TruEssence® from ORLANDI - PR Newswire
summary: Arcade Beauty, a provider of beauty solutions, acquired ORLANDI's TruEssence® business, including laboratory and slurry production equipment. This acquisition includes intellectual property for scented strips, a cost-effective way to deliver fragrance, while ORLANDI will focus on other sampling products. Arcade Beauty will consolidate its operations in a new facility, aiming to optimize production and innovation.
